Package index

All functions

pb_available()
Show available parsers
pb_collect()
Collect data from supplied URLs
pb_collect_rss()
Collect RSS feed
pb_deliver()
Deliver online news articles
pb_find_rss()
Find RSS feed on a newspapers website
pb_inspect()
Inspect content collected with pb_collect
pb_read_cookies()
Read in cookie file

Test a Parser
use_new_parser()
